question.title: Odd To Even
question.content:
You are given an odd number in the form of a string, ‘S.’ Your goal is to convert the number into an even number such that the following two conditions are satisfied.

You can use swap operation over any two indices i,e you can choose two indices 'i' and 'j' and swap the digits present at S[i] and S[j]. But this operation can be used only once.

Your final even number should be the largest out of all other possible even numbers.
Note:
If it isn’t possible to make an even number print -1
Input Format:
The first line of the input contains ‘T’ denoting the number of test cases.

The first and the only line of each test case contains a string ‘S’ the odd number.
Output Format:
If it is possible to make even number print largest out of all. Else print -1

Print the result of each test case in a new line.
Constraints:
1 <= T <= 5
0 <= |S| <= 10^5

Time Limit : 1 sec
Sample Input 1:
3
652345
79345
31179
Sample Output 1:
655342
79354
-1
Explanation For Sample Input 1:
In test case 1: 

552346, 655342, 652354 are the all possible even number which can be made by only using 1 swap operation.

Out of which 655342 is the largest, hence the answer.

In test case 2:
The only possible even number is 79354.

In test case 3:
There is no possible way to swap two digits to make the number even.
Sample Input 2:
2
635875915
64966689669
Sample Output 2:
635575918
94966689666

rephrased.body: Given an odd number represented as a string 'S', your task is to convert it into the largest possible even number by performing at most one swap operation between any two digits within the string. If it is not possible to create an even number, return -1.

testcases.explanation: Possible even numbers after a single swap are 552346, 655342, and 652354. The largest among them is 655342.
The only possible even number that can be formed by swapping digits is 79354.
It is not possible to obtain an even number by swapping any two digits in the given odd number.
The largest even number achievable after a single swap is 635575918.
The largest even number achievable after a single swap is 94966689666

hints: Generate all possible even numbers then print the largest out of them
